author.persName: Bartolomeo da San Miniato, Bartolomeo di

supportDesc.extent: 285 leaves : 287 x 210 mm. bound to 294 x 210 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Paper, i (parchment) + 285 + i (parchment); [i], 1-285, [ii]; contemporary foliation in ink, upper right recto.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in a cursive script by a single hand.
